title: Climate.govâ€™s Tom Di Liberto nominated for a regional Emmy award
content:
Tom Di Liberto hosts Climate Alive! Credit: NOAA

Tom Di Liberto hosts Climate Alive! Credit: NOAA NOAA CPO CEE's Tom Di Liberto was nominated for a regional (Chesapeake Bay region) Emmy award in the TALENT: PROGRAM HOST/MODERATOR/CORRESPONDENT category at the upcoming Capital Emmy awards to be held in late June 2022. The nomination is for Tom's hosting role for his NOAA Ocean Today Climate Alive! video, released in early 2021, discussing the climate happenings during 2020. This nomination follows this video also receiving a Blue Pencil and Gold Screen award from the National Association of Government Communicators. Read more at the link below. Click to read the full article
